casebody.data:
ATTORNEY GENERAL and Department of Environmental Quality, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
POLYONE CORPORATION, Successor to M.A. Hanna Company, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158360
COA: 339754 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 26, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion to allow out-of-state attorney Mark D.

Shepard to temporarily appear and practice in the case before this Court is GRANTED.
